name: Quick Daily Plan

breakfast.instructions: Scramble eggs with butter in pan, add cheese. Toast bread and serve together.

lunch.instructions: Mix tuna, mayo, and celery. Assemble sandwich with lettuce. Serve with apple slices.

dinner.instructions: Cook pasta. Brown ground beef with onion and garlic. Add marinara sauce and simmer 10 minutes. Serve over pasta with Parmesan.

prep_timeline.lunch_prep: 8 minutes - Can prep tuna salad night before
prep_timeline.dinner_prep: 25 minutes - Cook pasta while preparing sauce
time_saving_tips: Dice onion and celery when unpacking groceries
Pre-make tuna salad for quick lunch assembly
Use pre-shredded cheese to save time

goal_alignment.general_health: This plan provides balanced nutrition with adequate protein, complex carbohydrates, and healthy fats to support general wellness.
goal_alignment.allergy_compliance: All meals are completely nut-free, avoiding your allergy triggers while maintaining nutritional balance.
goal_alignment.budget_friendly: Total estimated daily cost: $10.00 - Uses affordable, accessible ingredients like eggs, canned tuna, and ground beef.
goal_alignment.quick_preparation: All meals can be prepared in 25 minutes or less, perfect for busy schedules.
goal_alignment.nutritional_balance: Provides approximately 1,850 calories with good protein distribution throughout the day and moderate variety.

special_notes: All ingredients are nut-free and safe for your allergy
Recipes use simple cooking methods requiring basic kitchen equipment
Ingredients are commonly available at most grocery stores
Portions can be adjusted based on individual appetite and needs
